text: @chicagosmayor With all due respect Mayor, let's focus on something other than what it's called. I can't even believe this is even an issue. So many other things to worry about other than if the fucking Chinese are offended. I personally don't feel the need to put a name before it. #COVID19

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
